attributes.action: Change licensing laws to promote alcohol-free drinks in pubs.
attributes.additional_details:
We would like the Government to change the licensing laws to require public houses and shops selling alcohol to prominently display for sale alcohol-free and low-alcohol alternatives to the drinks that they sell at reasonable prices. e.g. A shop selling beer should also sell alcohol-free and/or low alcohol beer side by side.

Increased availability of lower alcohol drinks should improve public health and reduce alcohol-related crime.
